altTitles.ja: 帰還したS級冒険者のクエスト生活

altTitles.ja-ro: Kikan Shita S-Kyuu Boukensha no Quest Seikatsu

altTitles.en: The Regressed S-Class Adventurer's Quest Life

description.en:
Dungeons began to suddenly appear throughout the world
Kyomi Aki became an S-Class adventurer assassin with his tremendous speed.
Unfortunately, assassins were considered as a failure class.
His class was becoming harder and harder to master the more he advanced.
The class itself had a low attack power and mana, so he needed to always rely on someone else.
One day, Aki encountered a dangerous monster that could wipe out the entirety of humanity.
He somewhat managed to subjugate the monster, but lost his life in the process.
Suddenly, he awoke and found himself having regressed 20 years into the past.
He also received an additional “Bonus Quest” as a reward for solo killing the monster.
With his knowledge from his previous lifetime and this “quest,” Aki resolved himself to redo everything to become the strongest adventurer.

description.el:
H Άι Χόσινο είναι ένα ανερχώμενο μουσικό είδωλο, η οποία ανακοίνωσε ξαφνικά οτι θα πάρει ενα διάλειμμα από το μουσικό της γκρουπ, Μπι-Κομάτσι, για λόγους υγείας. Προς εκπλήξη ενός από τους μεγαλύτερους θαυμάστες της, του γυναικολόγου Γκόρο Αμεμίγια, μια μέρα η νεαρή Αϊ εμφανίστηκε στο νοσοκομείο οπού δουλεύει. Ο Γκόρο έρχοντας πλεον πρόσωπο με πρόσωπο με την αδυναμία του, τρέμει στο γεγονός ότι η 16-χρονη Αϊ είναι έγκυος... με δίδυμα με τον πατέρα άφαντο. Αποφασισμένη να αποκτήσει την δικιά της οικογένεια και να συνεχίσει την δουλεία της ως είδωλο, έχει σκοπο να κρατήσει την γέννα των παιδιών της μυστικο, μαζί με την βοήθεια του Γκόρο.

Το δυνατότερο όπλο ενός ειδώλου ειναι τα ψέματα.
Μια ίστορια μυστηρίου και εξαπάτησης, όπου η σκοτεινή πλευρά της σόου-μπιζ αποκαλύπτεται κάτω από τις στρώσεις ψεμάτων και εκμεταλεύσεων.
description.en:
The story begins with a beautiful girl, her perfectly fake smile, and the people who love her selfishly for it.  
  
What transpires behind the scenes of the glittering showbiz industry? How far would you go for the sake of your beloved idol? What would you do if you found out reincarnation was real? The star of the show is Aquamarine Hoshino and the stage is but a mere facade. Will he manage to reach the climax before the world of glamour swallows him whole?
description.es:
'Oshi no Ko' explora la vida de una abrumadoramente hermosa heroína y muestra la industria del entretenimiento desde un punto de vista nunca antes visto.

- [Wikipedia](https://es.wikipedia.org/wiki/Oshi_no_Ko)
description.fa: آی هوشینو ۱۶ ساله یک آیدول با استعداد و زیباست که هواداران زیادی داره؛اون نماد پاکیه، ولی ظاهر با باطن قضیه متفاوته. گورو هوندا یک پزشک زنان که ساکن حومه‌ی شهره که یکی از طرفداران بزرگ آی هستش، ولی ناگهان آیدول مورد علاقه خودش رو ملاقات میکنه و متوجه میشه که اون بارداره، گورو به اون قول میده که بچش رو سالم بدنیا بیاره، ولی اون نمیدونست که این ملاقات باعث عوض شدن زندگیش میشه.
description.fr:
L'histoire commence avec une belle fille, son sourire parfaitement faux, et les gens qui l'aiment égoïstement pour cela. Que se passe-t-il dans les coulisses de la brillante industrie du showbiz? Jusqu'où iriez-vous pour votre idole bien-aimée ? Que feriez-vous si vous découvriez que la réincarnation est réelle? La star du spectacle est Aquamarine Hoshino et la scène n'est qu'une simple façade. Parviendra-t-il à atteindre le point culminant avant que le monde du glamour ne l'avale tout entier?  


---

- [Nominated for the 14th annual Manga Taisho awards.](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2021-01-24/14th-manga-taisho-awards-nominate-10-titles/.168759)

- [Wikipedia](https://fr.wikipedia.org/wiki/Oshi_no_ko)
description.ja: 「この芸能界（せかい）において嘘は武器だ」　地方都市で、産婦人科医として働くゴロー。芸能界とは無縁の日々。一方、彼の“推し”のアイドル・星野アイは、スターダムを上り始めていた。そんな二人が“最悪”の出会いを果たし、運命が動き出す…!?
description.ru:
Что, если бы дорога в шоу-бизнес была открыта для тебя с самого начала?  
Новая серия оригинальной манги от двух известных авторов — Акасака Ака («Госпожа Кагуя: в любви как на войне») и Ёкояри Мэнго («Тайные желания отвергнутых»). Это совершенно новая работа, в которой мир шоу-бизнеса предстаёт перед читателями в очень необычном свете: у лидера идол-группы Хосино Аи есть секрет, о котором никто не должен знать…  


---
- [Wikipedia](https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/Oshi_no_Ko)
description.vi:
Câu chuyện khởi đầu với sự xuất hiện của một cô gái xinh đẹp, mang nụ cười giả tạo hoàn hảo, và có những người yêu cô ấy một cách ích kỷ bất chấp điều đó.

Điều gì diễn ra đằng sau ánh hào quang của thế giới showbiz? Con người ta sẽ làm đến mức nào vì thần tượng yêu quý của mình? Bạn sẽ làm gì nếu phát hiện ra luân hồi chuyển kiếp là có thật? Nhân vật chính của chúng ta - Aquamarine Hoshino liệu có hoàn thành được khát vọng báo thù trước khi bị thế giới hào nhoáng ấy nuốt trọn? Hãy cùng đón xem bộ truyện được sáng tác bởi bộ đôi tác giả của Kaguya-sama và Kuzu no Honkai.
description.es-la:
La historia comienza con una hermosa chica, su sonrisa perfectamente falsa y la gente que la ama con egoísmo gracias a eso.
  
¿Qué ocurre detrás de la brillante industria del espectáculo? ¿Hasta dónde llegarías por el bien de tu ídolo? ¿Qué harías si descubrieras que la reencarnación es real? La estrella del espectáculo es Aquamarine Hoshino, y el escenario no es más que una mera fachada. ¿Conseguirá llegar al clímax antes de que el mundo del espectáculo se lo trague por completo?
description.pt-br: Doutor Goro é obstetra em um hospital do interior e se encontra longe do mundo em que brilha e evolui Aï Hoshino, uma cantora de sucesso crescente da qual é fã absoluto. O que ele ainda não sabe é que sem mais nem menos ele se encontrará com sua idol favorita em uma circunstância um pouco fora do normal. Terá ele tempo suficiente para ficar perto dela ou o mundo irá girar de maneira cruel para ele? Essa é uma história sobre o mundo do entretenimento japonês.

description.en:
Collection of one-shots about an egocentric and workaholic couple.  
  
This series is from the artist's Weibo, so no set update.  
Weibo: @喜喜果  
Twitter: @kikiko_xixiguo
description.fr: Ils sont collègues, ils sont amants, mais au travail l'amour n'a pas sa place et tous les coups sont permis !

description.en:
Come enter the world of hololive Alternative, an alternate universe fantasy project starring your favorite hololive VTubers!

This story has been lovingly brought to life by manga artist and hololive superfan Kurose Kousuke, of Goblin Slayer fame!

In the land of Yamato, humans live alongside kami. In the mountains near the city of Miyako sits Shirakami Shrine, where a certain kami has taken up residence and named herself acting priestess...
description.id:
Para Vtuber hololive beraksi di dunia fantasi dalam proyek karya dunia lain HOLOLIVE ALTERNATIVE.
Latar dunianya dikomikalisasi oleh Kurose Kousuke, seorang penggemar berat hololive yang juga dikenal sebagai orang yang menggambar komik "Goblin Slayer"!

Yamato, sebuah dunia tempat dewa dan manusia hidup bersama.
Ada suatu dewa yang tinggal di Kuil Shirakami, kuil yang lokasinya terletak agak jauh dari Kyo-no-Miyako.
Ia menyebut dirinya gadis kuil dan melindungi desa-desa dari Kegare.

「ホロライブ」のVTuber達が
ファンタジー世界で大活躍!!

「ホロライブ」のVTuberたちがファンタジー世界で活躍する、異世界創造プロジェクト「ホロライブ・オルタナティブ」。
その世界観を「ホロライブ」の熱烈なファンである、「ゴブリンスレイヤー」の黒瀬浩介がコミカライズ!!

カミとヒトが共に生きる世界「ヤマト」。
ミヤコから少し離れた山々の中にある「シラカミ神社」にはとあるカミが住み着き、巫女代行を名乗って村々をケガレから守っていた……。

Фантастическая приключенческая комедия с участием Карлы, тёмной эльфийки-клирика, которая слишком много вложила в навыки грубости, и Элвина, мечника, вынужденного мириться с ней.

altTitles.ja: 虚の記憶
虚（から）の記憶

description.en:
Between a recent move to Tokyo and the first day of high school, Rei starts his day filled with anxiety and insecurity. His nervousness accompanies him to the classroom, where amidst the classroom chatter, Rei is suddenly struck with a strange dream, followed by an aching in his chest.  
  
Once he wakes up, Rei is greeted by a small creature standing on his desk. Passing it off as part of his dream, Rei heads home. However, to his surprise, numerous other strange creatures of all shapes and sizes roam the streets, seemingly invisible to everyone else.  
  
With countless questions and the small creature from before trailing behind him, Rei's life is changed forever when he encounters a tall one-eyed figure, dressed in all black, smiling at him.

Note: This manga is based on the song 虚の記憶.

altTitles.en: Mitsuba's Stories - The Cursed Girl and the Circle-Dance of Death (Rondo)

description.en:
This world revolves around me.

While sleeping in a "deathly" boring dark world, Mitsuba woke up from a long sleep with a mysterious all-powerful feeling, the girl was destined to die, but the magic that was poured into her for 10 years brought the power of a "curse" that should not exist in this world.

Her stepmother, fearing Mitsuba's "death," takes away her aristocratic nature and she is  enrolled n a military academy. However, this was only the beginning of Mitsuba's use of the "curse" to pursue her own path.

The powerful "curse" that resides in a small girl causes a unique tale of otherworldly devastation!

Staying alive is a new form of entertainment.
When Dokyung, disillusioned by the harshness of life, finally resolves to call it quits, a bored demon, Hwamyung, appears before her with a particular offer. Will Dokyung, having entered into a contract with the Demon of Disillusionment, be able to flip her disastrous life upside down?

description.en:
Protect the Empire was considered unbeatable for over a decade until streamer extraordinaire Mr. Gamer Geek comes along and defeats the game on its hardest mode. But just when he's about to rest on his laurels, he's sucked into the world of the game by some mysterious figure and thrust into Prince Ash's body!

Ash now realizes that every click and command he had mindlessly sent out had real, gruesome costs - including his teammates' lives that he sacrificed for the sake of victory. To make up for his previous actions, Ash promises to keep his whole team alive this time while using his wits and knowledge to survive the hellish onslaught of monsters. 

But who brought him to this world in the first place, and why?

Ash may soon find the answers to these questions - if he can survive the bloody battlefield first!
description.fr:
Ash était un streamer de jeux vidéo, surnommé "otaku classique".

Une fois qu'il a réussi à terminer un des jeux classiques les plus compliqués, "Protégez l'Empire", il a été aspiré dans le monde du jeu et s'est réincarné en tant que prince héritier, complètement psychopathe. Dans le jeu d'origine, il était connu comme le pire commandant qui a causé la quasi-destruction des forces armées de la ville, et qui a rencontré une fin tragique.

Cependant, Ash est déterminé à survivre en tant que commandant ''invincible''.
description.ko:
타워디펜스&던전오펜스 RPG <제국을 지켜라>
누구도 클리어하지 못한 난이도로 게임의 엔딩을 봤다.
그런데 정신을 차리니 게임 속이다.
그것도 공략이 불가능한 튜토리얼 스테이지다.
"반드시 클리어해 주마, 이 거지 같은 게임……!"
description.th: <ปกป้องอาณาจักร> เกม RPG แนวป้องกันฐานและตะลุยดันเจี้ยน เกมที่ยากจนไม่มีใครเอาชนะมันได้ แต่ฉันทำได้จนได้เห็นตอนจบ ทว่าพอตั้งสติได้ก็กลับกลายเป็นว่าฉันได้เข้ามาอยู่ในเกมแล้ว แถมยังเป็นด่านปฐมบทที่ไม่มีทางเอาชนะได้อีกต่างหาก “ฉันจะเอาชนะมันให้ได้ ไอ้เกมเสงเครงนี่น่ะ.......!”
description.zh:
重生塔防游戏里的配角，通关地狱级难度的关卡！

无人能通关的地狱级难度塔防游戏“守护帝国”。当首次通关后发现自己居然在游戏里面，还处在不可能成功突破的新手教程剧情里？！

能否再一次成功攻略地狱级难度的游戏？

altTitles.ja: カラダ探し

description.en: Look forwards to the ghost story of the red person. "Hey, Asuka… search for my body". At school in the middle of the night, Asuka and her friends search for the scattered body-parts. If they don't find the entire body, the 9th November is repeated and the red person will continue to kill them. Who is the red person? Why is Haruka asking them to search for the body-parts?

Baphomet is the ruthless, dispassionate lord of the Abyssal Tower, a mysterious, monster-filled dungeon plaguing the human world. Many Hunters seek to defeat him and bring the tower down to no avail. Despite his demonic power, Baphomet grows curious about humanity. One day, Baphomet is defeated by Raven, the strongest Hunter, and realizes that his true wish is to be just like the humans he previously looked down on. In death, he is granted his wish, as he awakens as a human – without his powers!
description.fr:
Baphomet, le boss de la , attend un chasseur fort capable de se battre à armes égales contre lui.

Lorsqu’il s’est lassé de ces combats répétitifs, il a commencé à s’intéresser au monde de l’humanité grâce aux trophées qu’il avait obtenus des chasseurs morts.

Dans le même temps, il fut de plus en plus fasciné par l’existence des humains lorsque le puissant chasseur dont il avait toujours rêvé apparut devant lui.

Finalement, Baphomet essaie de devenir lui-même un humain…

altTitles.ja: 潔癖男子！青山くん

description.en: Aoyama is a handsome young soccer genius who's a Japan representative. His play style is "cleanliness." He doesn't tackle and doesn't head the ball. If he's doing a throw-in, he'll only do it if he's wearing gloves.
description.pl: Aoyama to przystojny, młody geniusz piłki nożnej, który reprezentuje Japonię. Jego styl gry to "czystość". Nie tackluje i nie główkuje piłki. Jeśli wykonuje wrzutkę, robi to tylko w rękawicach.

altTitles.ja: センシティブ・ボーイ

description.en:
Kaede, a victim of past sexual abuse, is obsessed with becoming "normal" ...  

A bittersweet story about a boy facing coming-of-age questions about love, sexuality, complexes, and other troubles.

The girl who was adopted by two mothers met her soulmate- another girl, when she was 16 years old. After dating for ten years, she decided to give herself to a man at the age of 28 … because she did not want to live this "abnormal life". Only after leaving her, did she finally understand the true meaning of love during those countless days and nights. However, can they still go back to the way things were?

altTitles.ja: とっても優しいあまえちゃん！

description.en:
Amae-chan is so sweet, kind, tender… she makes me feel so happy.  
  
And then there's me, the disappointment of a manga artist. But I will not be discouraged as long as I have Amae-chan with me!

title.en: Majo Maid wa Joou no Himitsu o Shitte Iru

altTitles.ja: 魔女メイドは女王の秘密を知っている。

altTitles.en: The Witch Maid Knows the Queen's Secret

altTitles.ne: बोक्सी दासीलाई रानीको रहस्य थाहा छ।

description.en: Liz, whose engagement is broken off due to her mysterious power to see the future is hired as a maid by Her Majesty, Queen Schriess of Lynphilia. Her Majesty is neither married, nor has an heir, and her five younger brothers have started a struggle for succession. But, Liz ended up finding out, finding out that the queen whom everyone wishes to have a prompt wedding for the sake of the future hides a big secret.

Because of her father's debt, 'Lily' lives in the mansion of her father's creditor, 'Rose'. At the mansion where Lily goes with Anna, the only maid she relies on and loves, she meets the attractive Rose...


[NTR Warning]

altTitles.en: The Young Lady Is a Royal Chef

altTitles.es: La princesa es un chef imperial

altTitles.ja: お嬢様はロイヤル・シェフ

description.en:
Sena’s been tossed into another world, as the despised daughter of a noble family. Her little restaurant was her refuge in her last life, so she’s got some tricks up her sleeve—cooking skills! 

As Senianna, she’ll put her brains and fine-tuned taste buds (Korean fried chicken, anyone?) to the test so she can take back the kitchen and gain this society’s esteemed title of Chef Royale. Will her cuisine reign supreme over the empire and bring her the sweet and salty balance of power and affection?

---

[Original Webtoon](https://page.kakao.com/home/55268483)

Official Translations:
* [English](https://tapas.io/series/lady-chef-royale/info)
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.podoteng.com/)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Royal-Chef-Lady/3380)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/46395)
---
As a chef at a small knight's restaurant, I became the nuisance youngest daughter of a powerful man who was afraid of the emperor. I tried to run away with all my travel expenses…

It’s strange.

“If you say you're sorry, are you that shameless?”
“That’s because I’m your brother.”
“Why don't you take Grandmother on a stroll?”

Why is everyone so nice to me all of a sudden?

“Why do you want to take out someone's eyeballs when they see me?"

People who had caught me trying to escape. I'm just cooking. What's wrong with you?
description.id:
Aku yang dulu hidup dalam penderitaan sewaktu kecil, kini berhasil menjalankan restoran kecil di pinggir jalan dengan guruku yang menjadi orang tua sekaligus teman terbaikku.

Hingga suatu saat, guruku meninggal. Tapi, kemalanganku tidak berhenti di sana. Aku meninggal dan mendapati diriku di dunia lain. Aku kembali hidup sebagai cucu orang paling kuat di wilayah timur?!

Mendapati diriku sebagai Seniana, sekarang aku harus berjuang menjalani hidup dan menjadi royal chef paling hebat!

---

[Original Webtoon](https://page.kakao.com/home/55268483)

Official Translations:
* [English](https://tapas.io/series/lady-chef-royale/info)
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.podoteng.com/)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Royal-Chef-Lady/3380)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/46395)
description.ko:
작은 기사 식당의 요리사였던 나는 황제도 두려워하는 권력가의 천덕꾸러기 막내딸이 되었다.
여비를 저축해 도망치려고 했는데…

이상하다.

"네게 미안하다고 하면 염치가 없는 건가."
"그야 내가 네 오빠니까."
"할애비와 산책해 주지 않는 거냐."

다들 갑자기 왜 잘해 주는 거지?

"너를 보는 놈들의 눈알을 죄 뽑아 버리고 싶은 건 왜일까요."

도망치려는 나와 붙잡는 사람들.
요리만 했을 뿐인데 왜 이러는 거람…

---

title.en: Gakuen Mono no Otome Game no Sekai ni Tensei Shita kedo, Cheat-mochi no Haikei Danshi Seito datta you desu

altTitles.ja: 学園物の乙女ゲームの世界に転生したけど、チート持ちの背景男子生徒だったようです。

altTitles.zh-hk: 我似乎在學園主題的乙女遊戲世界中轉生，但我是一個有外掛的背景男子學生。

altTitles.en: It Seems that I was Reincarnated into the World of a School Otome Game, but I was a Background Male Student with Cheats.

description.en: Kenta, a freelancer, is reincarnated into a world that resembles a school otome game that his sister likes, and he finds himself a male student with a background character. In his reincarnation, Kenta tries his best to improve his living environment as a commoner, Kent, by making his part-time bakery across the street from his house thrive, but for some reason, more and more attractive women start to appear around him.

altTitles.ja: デュラハンちゃんは首ったけ

description.en: I'm Dullahan Itoshino. A normal girl who can take her head off. From today on I'll be a middle schooler! I hope I'll get closer to my destined one~ but sometimes my heart suddenly beats faster, I want to run away, and my body and mind feel torn apart… is this the thing called "puberty" I wonder? Heart(head) and body apart, story about puberty and love, start!
description.es-la: Hola Soy Dullahan Itoshino. Una chica normal que puede quitarse la cabeza. A partir de hoy voy a ser un estudiante de secundaria! Espero poder estar más cerca de mi chico destinado ~ pero a veces mi corazón late más rápido de repente, yo quiero huir, y mi cuerpo y mente se sienten destrozada ... es esto lo que llamamos "pubertad" Me pregunto? Corazón (cabeza) y el cuerpo aparte, historia sobre la pubertad y el amor va comenzar!

altTitles.th: ฮารุของฮานะ

description.en: A werewolf love for a human girl In a cold winter, little girl Hana and her family found a boy covered in blood, the boy is a werewolf baby. They picked up the boy, named him Haru, treated him and accepted him as a family member. A human girl and a werewolf boy who grew up over time. From now on their story begins.
description.tr: Soğuk bir kış mevsiminde küçük kız Hana ve ailesi, kanlar içinde bir çocuk bulurlar, bu çocuk yavru bir kurt adamdır. Haru adını verdikleri çocuğu yanlarına alıp tedavi ederler ve onu aileden biri olarak kabul ederler. Zamanla insan kız ve kurt adam çocuk büyürler, ve hikâyeleri de bu noktadan sonra başlar.

title.en: Onii-chan Is Done For! - Highschool ONIMAI (Doujinshi)

description.en: Without being able to return to being a man, Mahiro Oyama stayed as a girl since middle school and now has become a beautiful high-schooler who gets completely dominated by his first friend since the transformation, Momiji Hozuki, who has gotten really tall and became popular with the girls in their school.
description.pt-br: Sem poder voltar a ser homem, Mahiro Oyama permaneceu como uma menina desde o ensino fundamental e agora se tornou uma linda estudante do ensino médio que é completamente dominada por sua primeira amiga desde a transformação, Momiji Hozuki, que ficou muito alta e se tornou  popular entre as meninas da escola.

title.en: The Villainess Just Wants To Live In Peace!

description.en:
I transmigrated as the villainess of a novel.

I wanted to get rid of my death flag and live in peace, but apparently I’ve already been whipping and tormenting the final villain. I wasn't the one who did it, but since I still felt responsible for it, I’ve been taking care of him, and the villain's loyalty towards me keeps increasing.

I just want to enjoy my wealth and honor in peace.
I don't know why the story keeps going astray!

altTitles.ja: ちえりの恋は8メートル

altTitles.pt-br: O amor de Chieri tem 8 metros

description.en:
An ordinary high school student, Yumeji Kotaki, is transferred to his class by his childhood friend, Chieri Omine, who has grown to 8 meters in height! Yumeji is assigned as "caretaker" to support Chieri's school life. Their daily life is full of excitement due to the height difference! The height difference is nothing to worry about!

The start of a literally larger-than-life romcom!
description.pt-br:
Uma aluna transferida que tem 8 metros de altura...?! 
Amigos de infância se reencontram, mas nem tudo é como antes… Uma mudança na relação entre Chieri e Yumeji, acompanhe o desenrolar desta comédia romântica gigantesca.

title.en: S-Rank Monster no Behemoth Dakedo, Neko to Machigawarete Erufu Musume no Kishi (Pet) Toshite Kurashitemasu

altTitles.en: I Am Behemoth Of The S Rank Monster, But I Am Mistaken As A Cat And I Live As A Pet Of Elf Girl
I'm a “Behemoth,” an S-Ranked Monster, But Mistaken for a Cat, I Live As an Elf Girl's Pet
I’m an S-Rank "Behemoth" Monster, but I’m Living as a Knight (Pet) of an Elf Girl

altTitles.es: Soy un monstruo de rango S, Behemoth, pero me confundieron con un gato y ahora vivo como el caballero (mascota) de una chica elfa.

altTitles.ja: Sランクモンスターの《ベヒーモス》だけど、猫と間違われてエルフ娘の騎士(ペット)として暮らしてます
Sランクモンスターの《ベヒーモス》だけどネコと間違われてエルフ娘の騎士として暮らしています

altTitles.de: Ich bin ein mächtiger Behemoth und lebe als Kätzchen bei einer Elfe

altTitles.ru: Я монстр S-класса Бегемот, но меня перепутали с котом, и я живу у эльфийки как домашний питомец

altTitles.zh: 虽然是S级魔兽“比蒙巨兽” 却以猫的模样、成为精灵娘的骑士的日常

description.en: The elven girl Aria is a stunning and swift adventurer. When a small cat-like beast with an adorable face embraces Aria's fruitful chest during a dungeon exploration, she decides to keep it as a pet and names it "Tama". At first sight it's just an average cat, but Aria has yet to notice that Tama is a reincarnated chivalrous former Knight and that its identity is not that of a cat, but of a young monster of the strongest class "Behemoth".
description.es:
La chica elfa, "Aria" es una aventurera. Cuando una pequeña bestia con una cara adorable abraza el fructífero pecho de Aria, ella decide tenerla como mascota y la llama "Tama". A primera vista es sólo un gato común, pero Aria aún no se ha dado cuenta de que Tama es un antiguo Caballero y que su identidad no es un gato, sino un joven monstruo de la clase más fuerte "Behemoth".  
  
**Links:**  
- [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n9107ee) (Raw)  
- [Official Light Novel (EN)](https://yenpress.com/9781975332945/im-a-behemoth-an-s-ranked-monster-but-mistaken-for-a-cat-i-live-as-an-elf-girls-pet-vol-1-light-novel/)
description.pt: A garota elfa, "Aria" é uma aventureira. Uma pequena besta com um adorável rosto abraça o peito frutoso da Aria, ela decide manter como um animal de estimação chamado "Tama". Ao primeiro sinal é apenas um gato comum, mas Aria ainda não notou que esta Tama é um cavaleiro antigo e sua identidade não é de um gato, mas um jovem monstro da classe mais poderosa chamada "Behemoth".

title.en: Saikyou Ansatsusha, Class Ten'i de Isekai e

altTitles.ja: 最強暗殺者、クラス転移で異世界へ

altTitles.en: The Strongest Assassin Gets Transferred to Another World With His Whole Class

altTitles.pt-br: O Assassino Mais Forte é Transferido Para Outro Mundo Com Toda a Sua Classe

description.en:
An ordinary high school student by day, an assassin living in the underworld by the night. A boy with two faces, Aragi Kai. His classmates hate him because of his anti-social character and weird aura.

One day, Aragi and his classmates were suddenly transferred to another world. It is a world of swords and magic. A woman who calls herself Leonora appears before the confused students, and declares…

“You are Hero Candidates summoned here to defeat the Demon King. Please help us.”

Leonora grants each of the students a unique ability: ‘Divine Protection’. While some powerful ‘Divine Protections’ are given like telekinesis and destructive blast, Aragi’s ‘Divine Protection’ is judgment.

Faced with doomsday, the special power inside Ling Mo was woken up. He found out that he could control zombies. Therefore he could walk through the zombie crowd safe and sound using his power, and eventually, he met his beloved girlfriend - Ye Lian, but only to find out that she had already been transformed into a zombie. To help Ye retrieve her memories, Ling Mo started his survival in doomsday.
description.pl: W obliczu dnia zagłady, Ling Mo przebudził wewnątrz siebie specjalną moc. Odkrył on, że może kontrolować zombie. Dlatego mógł bezpiecznie przejść przez tłum zombie i przeżyć, a ostatecznie spotkał swoją ukochaną dziewczynę - Ye Lian, ale tylko by dowiedzieć się, że została już przekształcona w zombie. Aby pomóc Ye odzyskać swoje wspomnienia, Ling Mo rozpoczął swoje przetrwanie podczas apokalipsy.
description.es-la: Ante el día del juicio final, el poder especial dentro de Ling Mo fue despertado. Él se percató que podía controlar a los zombis. Debido a su poder, podía caminar sano y salvo a través de la multitud de zombis, y eventualmente se reunió con su amada novia, Ye Lian, pero solo para descubrir que ella ya se había transformado en un zombi. Para ayudarla a recuperar sus recuerdos, Ling Mo comenzó su supervivencia en el día del juicio final.
description.pt-br: Diante do apocalypse, o poder especial dentro de Ling Mo foi despertado. Ele descobriu que podia controlar os zumbis. Por causa de seu poder, Ele podia caminhar em segurança através de hordas de zumbis, e, eventualmente, ele se reencontrou com sua amada namorada – Ye Lian, Apenas para descobrir que ela já havia se transformado em um zumbi. Para ajudá-la a recuperar suas memórias, Ling Mo embarca em uma jornada para sobreviver no apocalypse.

title.en: Yandere Koroshi!! - Shuuchaku Yaba me no Osananajimi ni "Watashi mo Suki" to Tsutaetara, Lovecome Route ni Shift shimashita

altTitles.zh-hk: 病嬌的敗北！！～執著系竹馬得知兩情相悅後竟轉變為純情少男～

altTitles.zh: 病娇的败北！！～执着系竹马得知两情相悦后竟转变为纯情少男～

altTitles.ja: ヤンデレ殺し!! ～執着ヤバめの幼馴染に「私も好き」と伝えたら、ラブコメルートにシフトしました～

altTitles.ja-ro: Yandere Koroshi!! - Shuuchaku Yabame no Osananajimi ni "Watashi mo Suki" to Tsutaetara, Lovecome Route ni Shift shimashita

altTitles.en: Yandere Killing!! ~When I told my obsessive childhood friend, "I love you too," she shifted to the romantic comedy route~

description.en:
"Good-looking ears, nape, boobs... You're sensitive and cute, Sayuki." ◆ "...I won't wait any longer. Sayuki Yashima and Masato Ohara are childhood friends who work in the same building. The two usually act as close friends, but in reality, Sayuki has been in love with him for many years. One day, due to a certain incident, Sayuki learns about Masato's "true identity"...? (“Make Sayuki completely mine”…………That means we love each other~!?!?) For some reason, the heavy love of a yandere boy makes her heart pound.
A yandere (?) love comedy with a new, ecchi feel from the tag team of Monaka Usagiyama and Kazuichi!
description.ja: 「形のいい耳も、首筋も、おっぱいも…。敏感で可愛いね、紗雪」◆「…もう待たない。徹底的に、紗雪を俺のモノにする」――栢島紗雪（かやしま・さゆき）と大原眞人（おおはら・まひと）は幼なじみ同士で職場も同じビル。普段は仲の良い友人を演じているふたりだが、実は紗雪は長年の間、眞人への恋心を抱き続けていた。そんなある日、とある出来事がきっかけで、紗雪は眞人の「正体」を知ることになるのだが……？（『徹底的に紗雪を俺のモノにする』って……………それってつまり私たち、相思相愛ってコト～!?!?）ヤンデレ男子の重すぎる愛がなぜか胸キュン要素に変換されて、熱愛展開まっしぐら!?　ねっとり抱いてぎゅっと抱き返されて、予測不能な恋のゆくえは…？　兎山もなか×かずいちのタッグが贈る、極上えっちな新感覚ヤンデレ（？）ラブコメディ！

description.en: A mystery murder case shatters Lan Zhiqing's serene and blissful life into pieces. The past she has long forgotten returns in the form of a nightmarish case, encroaching ever the closer... Shocked, Lan Zhiqing discovers that the most dangerous existence may just be the person she shares a bed with.

title.en: Kiyo in Kyoto: From the Maiko House

altTitles.ja: 舞妓さんちのまかないさん

altTitles.en: The Caterer at the Maiko Manor
The Makanai: Cooking for the Maiko House

description.en:
Within the winding streets of Kyoto's geisha district lives a 16 year old girl named Kiyo. 
After failing to become a Maiko, a traditional dance apprentice, she starts working as caterer for her troupe. 
This is the story of her daily life.  

Published in Indonesian by Elex Media as **Juru Masak Para Maiko**.

Anime: [AniDB](https://anidb.net/anime/15476) | [MAL](https://myanimelist.net/anime/41556/Maiko-san_Chi_no_Makanai-san) | [ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=23951) | [LC](https://www.livechart.me/anime/9863) | [IMDB](https://www.imdb.com/title/tt13884016/)
Live-action dorama: [Netflix](https://www.netflix.com/title/81325501) | [MyDramaList](https://mydramalist.com/718203-kiyo-in-kyoto) | [IMDB](https://www.imdb.com/title/tt15964848/)
 
--- 
- **Won the 65th Shogakukan Manga Award for Shonen Manga**
description.ja: ここは京都のど真ん中にある花街。 舞妓さんたちが深夜、お仕事を終えたあと帰ってきて、共同生活を送っているのは、「屋形」と呼ばれるおうちです。 とある屋形で「まかないさん」として舞妓さんたちに毎日の食事を作っているのは、なんと弱冠16歳の少女・キヨ。 彼女がまかないさんになったのには、ある意外な理由があって——。 華やかな花街の舞台裏、普通の日のごはんを通して、温かな人間模様が描かれます。

altTitles.ja: フランケン・ふらん Frantic
フランケン・ふらん フランティック

description.en:
The wacky adventures of Fran, Veronica and the other strange creatures continue.  
  
More experiments, more medical miracles and more wondrous surprises.

altTitles.ja: Rabu Rabo
Renai Lab
ラブラボ
恋愛ラボ

description.en:
Love Lab is set in Fujisaki Girls Academy, which is known for their school body being composed of very prim and proper middle school students. The most prominent one of them is Natsuo Maki, the student council president who is admired by her classmates for her calm and polite demeanor, and her profound beauty. On the other hand, Riko Kurahashi is also admired, but due to her having a very forward and boyish personality.   
  
One day, Riko accidentally walks into Maki when she is kissing a body pillow with a picture of a guy for practice, and learns that she is not as collected as everyone thinks she is. Riko is forced into keeping Maki's secret and joins her in practicing romance activities such as holding hands and more, and in the middle of all that mess, somehow smoothly running a student council regardless!

"Arch, will you mate with me?"  
 Deep in the mountain lives a beautiful young man, Bau. He is a faithful woodcutter who makes rice wine deep in the field. "God of the mountain I would like to have a good companion", he prayed and prayed. But, the only things that came back were the tracks of the deer that destroyed his precious field! One day, Bau found an unconscious yet fascinating man with dark and rigid skin, huge muscles and a bulging tusk in front of him, along with a broken glass of wine. He realized at that moment: "Finally, the mountain god have given me a good companion! Let's go home mate!"  
  
Note: Omegaverse.
description.tr:
"Benimle çiftleşir misin?"  
Dağın derinliklerinde, tarlasında pirinç şarabı yapan Bau adında güzel bir genç adam yaşarmış. Dağ Tanrısı'na iyi bir eş için dua eder. Ancak karşılığında aldığı tek şey, değerli tarlasını yok eden su geyiğinin izleri olur. Bir gün Bau, kırılmış bir şarap testisinin önünde bilinçsizce yatan koyu ve sert tenli, muazzam kaslara ve çıkıntılı sivri dişlere sahip büyüleyici bir adam bulur. O anda anlar: "Sonunda, Dağ Tanrısı bana iyi bir partner verdi! Hadi eve gidelim, eşim!"  
  
*omegaverse

title.en: The Skeleton Soldier Failed to Defend the Dungeon

altTitles.en: Skeleton Soldier Couldn't Protect the Dungeon

altTitles.pt-br: O Soldado Esqueleto Que Não Conseguia Proteger a Dungeon

altTitles.ja: 骸骨兵士はダンジョンを守れなかった

altTitles.zh: 骷髅骑士没能守住副本

description.de: Die Abenteuer eines scheinbar schwachen Skelettsoldaten, dessen einziges Ziel es ist, seine Herrin, Lady Sukkubus, zu beschützen und ihr zu dienen. Sein Traum eines friedlichen Lebens mit ihr findet ein jähes Ende, als die beiden von einer Gruppe Krieger brutal ermordet wird. Aber aus einem kläglichen Ende wird ein hoffnungsvoller Neuanfang, als der Skelettsoldat sich 20 Jahre in der Vergangenheit wiederfindet! „Ich muss Lady Sukkubus vor all dem warnen!“ Aber ohne besondere Kampffähigkeiten und einer Geschichte voller Fehlschläge und Verluste, wie kann er diese grauenvolle Zukunft abwenden? Folge dem Skelettsoldaten in seiner bisher wichtigsten Mission: Seine eigene Geschichte neu zu schreiben.
description.en:
The Skeleton Soldier, a meager but fiercely loyal fighter who serves to protect its master, Lady Succubus. Its dream of a peaceful life with her is shattered when they're both brutally murdered by a group of warriors one day.

But what would’ve been a pathetic end to an unremarkable soul sparks a new beginning: when the Skeleton Soldier opens its eyes again, it has traveled back 20 years in time!

“I must warn Lady Succubus of all the things to come!”

But with no special combat skills and a history of failure and defeat, how can it stop the horrible events from unfolding again?

Follow the Skeleton Soldier as it faces the most challenging quest of all — rewriting the ending to its own story.
description.fr: Découvrez le Soldat Squelette, le frêle mais loyal combattant, se battant pour protéger sa maîtresse, Dame Succube. Son rêve d'une vie paisible à ses côtés est réduit à néant le jour où ils sont tous les deux brutalement assassinés par un groupe de guerriers. Mais ce qui allait être une fin tragique se révèle être en fait un nouveau commencement : le Soldat Squelette se réveille de nouveau... 20 ans plus tôt ! Il doit prévenir sa Dame du danger qui les guette, mais sans compétences au combat, et un large historique de défaites, sera-t-il capable de sauver leur avenir ? Suivez ce courageux squelette dans sa quête pour changer le cours du temps et son tragique destin !
description.ja: 「お守りできず、申し訳ありません…」　名もなきモンスター「骸骨兵士」は、主のサキュバスを守れぬまま、自分の弱さを嘆きつつ心半ばで朽ち果てる…が、いきなり20年前に蘇る！何度死んでも蘇り、蘇るたびに経験値も蓄積されていく謎のシステムまで付加された。「このチャンス、逃さないでおくべきか」いつか再会するであろうサキュバス様を守るため、骸骨兵士は強くなることを誓う
description.ko:
"지키기 위해서 나는 강해진다!"


이름 없는 일개 몬스터 '해골병사'.

자신의 주인인 서큐버스를 지키지 못한채 죽임을 당한다.

그러나,

갑자기 20년 전으로 돌아간다?!

일생일대의 최대의 기회!


자신이 지키기 못한 서큐버스를 위해서

해골은 성장해 나간다!
description.ru: Защитить хозяйку было его единственным предназначением, но он не смог исполнить его. Однако судьба дарует ему новый шанс. Шанс стать сильнее и спасти свою госпожу. Шанс переписать историю.
description.zh: 骷髅骑士发现自己回到了20年前，这一世骷髅骑士立志要好好守护主人。然而...都死了那么多次，怎么还没找到守护主人的正确打开方式！一次不行那就再来第二次，第二次不行那就来第三次…这是一个可以无限次重生的骷髅骑士的奇幻历险故事。
description.pt-br: Seu único propósito era proteger sua mestra. Mesmo assim ele foi incapaz. Mas o destino tinha mais reservado a ele já que conseguiu uma nova chance para proteger sua mestra e mudar seu destino.
description.zh-hk:
「為了守護珍愛的一切，我必須變強!」
無名怪物「骷髏士兵」沒能守護自己的主人魅魔，
便慘遭殺害。

然而，他卻突然回到了20年前?!
這是千載難逢的絕佳機會!

為了自己上次守護不了的魅魔，
骷髏將會努力成長!

title.en: Please Lay Your Eyes on Jasmine

description.en: Jasmine had an accident with her one-sided love, Duke Aion. The straightforward man, who had not paid attention to her before, who had consistently ignored her, for some reason, now caught the feeling… “Don't you like me? Is that a lie? "Why would I lie about that?" “I know. You are that kind of person.” He was in a phase where he broke off from his cursed love, but instead it took a turn for the worse.

title.en: The Slave Girl and the Vampire with a Death Wish

altTitles.en: The Slave Girl and the Vampire with a Death Wish

altTitles.ja: 奴隷少女と死にたがり吸血鬼

description.en:
Falsely accused of poisoning a noble, Sherry heads into the forest to escape her pursuers. There, she meets a vampire who accidentally injures her in his hunger. Feeling guilty, he tells her that he'll do anything to get her forgiveness. Seeing this as a chance to rise out of misfortune, she tells him she wishes to be his bride. She uses various means to get him to fall in love with her, but who will actually be the one to fall first?!  
  
[Pre-serialization](https://www.comico.jp/challenge/articleList.nhn?titleNo=23613)

altTitles.th: มายฮีโร่ อคาเดเมีย

altTitles.ja: ヒロアカ
僕のヒーローアカデミア

description.en:
One day, a four-year-old boy came to a sudden realization: the world is not fair. Eighty percent of the world's population wield special abilities, known as "quirks," which have given many the power to make their childhood dreams of becoming a superhero a reality. Unfortunately, Izuku Midoriya was one of the few born without a quirk, suffering from discrimination because of it. Yet, he refuses to give up on his dream of becoming a hero; determined to do the impossible, Izuku sets his sights on the elite hero training academy, UA High.  
  
However, everything changes after a chance meeting with the number one hero and Izuku's idol, All Might. Discovering that his dream is not a dead end, the powerless boy undergoes special training, working harder than ever before. Eventually, this leads to him inheriting All Might's power, and with his newfound abilities, gets into his school of choice, beginning his grueling journey to become the successor of the best hero on the planet.

---

**Note: Because a takedown notice was sent to MangaDex from the owners of this series, fan translations of My Hero Academia are currently unavailable to be uploaded. The three most recent chapters can also be read on MangaPlus for free at the below link.**
description.es:
Un día, un niño de cuatro años se dio cuenta de repente: el mundo no es justo. El 80% de la población mundial posee habilidades especiales, conocidas como «quirks», que han dado a muchos el poder de hacer realidad sus sueños infantiles de convertirse en superhéroes. Por desgracia, Izuku Midoriya fue uno de los pocos que nació sin una «quirk», sufriendo discriminación por ello. Sin embargo, se niega a renunciar a su sueño de convertirse en un héroe; decidido a hacer lo imposible, Izuku pone sus miras en la academia de entrenamiento de héroes de élite, UA High.  
  
Sin embargo, todo cambia tras un encuentro casual con el héroe número uno e ídolo de Izuku, All Might. Al descubrir que su sueño no es un callejón sin salida, el chico sin poderes se somete a un entrenamiento especial, esforzándose más que nunca. Finalmente, esto le lleva a heredar el poder de All Might y, con sus nuevas habilidades, consigue entrar en la escuela de su elección, comenzando su agotador viaje para convertirse en el sucesor del mejor héroe del planeta.
description.fr:
Dans un monde où 80 % de la population possède un super-pouvoir appelé alter, les héros font partie de la vie quotidienne. Et les super-vilains aussi ! Face à eux se dresse l’invincible All Might, le plus puissant des héros ! Le jeune Izuku Midoriya en est un fan absolu. Il n’a qu’un rêve : entrer à la Hero Academia pour suivre les traces de son idole.
Le problème, c’est qu’il fait partie des 20 % qui n’ont aucun pouvoir…

Son destin est bouleversé le jour où sa route croise celle d’All Might en personne ! Ce dernier lui offre une chance inespérée de voir son rêve se réaliser. Pour Izuku, le parcours du combattant ne fait que commencer !

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Ki-oon**
description.ru: Манга повествует о мире, где больший процент населения человечества рождается с необычной способностью (называется это - причуда), но наш главный герой в этот процент не попал. И по всем законам жанра неудачник сам упорно пытается достичь небывалой силы и приблизиться к своей мечте - стать супергероем.
description.vi:
Thế giới trở nên tràn ngập những người sở hữu một thứ siêu năng lực gọi là "Kosei"! Các "Siêu anh hùng" xuất hiện chống lại những tên tội phạm "Villain" chuyên lợi dụng "Kosei" để lộng hành. Sức mạnh áp đảo của họ làm nhiều người vô cùng ngưỡng mộ. Nhân vật chính là cậu bé Midoriya Izuku (tên thường gọi là "Deku") cũng ôm ấp giấc mơ trở thành "Siêu anh hùng"....!?

(Source: MangaPlus)
description.es-la:
Un día, un niño de cuatro años se dio cuenta de repente: el mundo no es justo. El 80% de la población mundial posee habilidades especiales, conocidas como «quirks», que han dado a muchos el poder de hacer realidad sus sueños infantiles de convertirse en superhéroes. Por desgracia, Izuku Midoriya fue uno de los pocos que nació sin una «quirk», sufriendo discriminación por ello. Sin embargo, se niega a renunciar a su sueño de convertirse en un héroe; decidido a hacer lo imposible, Izuku pone sus miras en la academia de entrenamiento de héroes de élite, UA High.  
  
Sin embargo, todo cambia tras un encuentro casual con el héroe número uno e ídolo de Izuku, All Might. Al descubrir que su sueño no es un callejón sin salida, el chico sin poderes se somete a un entrenamiento especial, esforzándose más que nunca. Finalmente, esto le lleva a heredar el poder de All Might y, con sus nuevas habilidades, consigue entrar en la escuela de su elección, comenzando su agotador viaje para convertirse en el sucesor del mejor héroe del planeta.
description.pt-br: Em um mundo onde quase toda a população possui algum poder sobre-humano, Izuku Midoriya é um dos poucos casos de pessoas comuns. Mas esse não é o maior de seus problemas. Exatamente por ser desprovido de qualquer poder, Izuku sofre constantemente nas mãos de seus colegas de classe. Nesse mundo fictício, desde o primeiro caso constatado de um recém-nascido com algum tipo de poder, o índice de criminalidade cresceu proporcional ao surgimento de heróis com as mais variadas capacidades. E, como não poderia deixar de ser, o sonho de Izuku é se tornar um super-herói. Isso parecia impossível, até o dia que ele ajuda o poderoso All Might na captura de um vilão gosmento. Ao demonstrar grande coragem e um forte senso de justiça, com a ajuda do famoso herói de cabelos louros, o garoto enfim terá a chance de se tornar quem sempre sonhou!

description.en: "If you wish to return, then you must find all the stones of the Dragon's Heart!" And so, Lee started his adventure to become an unparalleled mage. Which bonds will he find? That's all up to him, to discover…
description.ko:
평범한 고등학생에서 벗어나 레드 드래곤 레이어드에 의해 아르세니아 대륙으로 소환된 이결.
집으로 가기 위해서는 마법사가 되어서 드래곤 하트 조각을 모아야만 한다!
마법사가 되어버린 고등학생 이결은 새로운 동료들과 함께 아르세니아 대륙 모험을 시작한다!
description.ru: Обычного старшеклассника призывают в страну Арсению. Из его тела открывается портал Красного дракона. Чтобы попасть домой, он должен стать магом и собрать по частям сердце дракона. Приключения ученика, ставшего магом, и его новых друзей начинаются!

description.en:
Dante Carter was an ordinary boy in an ordinary family with his parents and younger sister. Until the whole family was murdered in cold blood. When he woke up in the Afterlife, the demons of Hell were waiting for him. They demanded that he reveal his true identity, because the court of Heaven could not properly judge his fate.

(Source: Comic Fuz, translated)

A scholar who failed the national exams is picked up by a martial arts master and given the task to record his life into a book. Through their journey, Son Bin meets many great people and soon finds himself following the same path as the master, as the Martial Arts King.

description.ko:
온갖 비리가 가득한 과거 시험에 낙방해 좌절한 주인공 손빈. 
자신의 신세를 한탄하는 손빈 앞에 나타난 사자혁은 그에게 자신의 일대기를 기록할 것을 청한다. 
이후 둘은 함께 천하를 주유하게 되는데, 과연 그가 써 내려가는 무림 일대기는 어떠한 기록을 남기게 되고, 무림 세계에 발을 들이게 된 손빈의 운명은 어찌 흘러갈는지……

description.ru:
Завалив экзамен на государственного чиновника, молодой ученый Сон Бин решает утопить свое горе в алкоголе, но по велению судьбы встречает великого воина Мурима, Са Джахека, разглядевшего в нем потенциал.
«Все, что не записано, навсегда становится утерянным и захороненным».
Са Джахек приглашает беспристрастного юношу написать мемуары о его великих подвигах и заключает с ним сделку: Сон Бин может бежать куда угодно, но, если спустя 3 дня воин найдет его, юноша последует за ним...
Какую историю запишет кисть молодого ученого? Как сложится его дальнейшая судьба в этом мире?

落榜书生巧遇玄天武帝，
浪迹人间书写笔下江湖！
孙斌是个仕途多舛的贫苦文士，某天在酒馆失意买醉之时遇到了武林强者——史子赫。史子赫为了让自己的一生能够名留青史，于是让孙斌跟在他身边，将他的辉煌一生记录下来写成传记。就这样孙斌开始和史子赫周游各地，开阔眼界。终于领悟什么才是真正的强大……

description.en:
When Seo Junho and his companions sacrificed themselves to defeat the Frost Queen, they thought they were restoring peace to Earth. But after 25 years of being frozen solid, Junho thaws out only to find that nine more floors appeared in his absence, only one of which has been cleared!

As the only one who holds the key to clearing the next floor and defrosting his friends, Junho must step up once again. But has this hero been in hibernation too long to take on the world’s fearsome new foes?

description.ja:
2019年世界は変わり、以前にはなかったゲート、モンスター、システム、プレイヤーのような概念が生まれた。 そこから5年間「侵略者」と「侵略を阻止する者」との戦いが世界各地で起きた。 そして世界を絶望に陥れた地球エリア最後のボス「氷の女王」により、5人のプレイヤーの内4人は氷の像となってしまう。 唯一ダンジョンに残された人類最高のプレーヤー、ダークネスは、氷の女王を倒すが、女王の能力を吸収する過程で彼もまた氷の像となった。氷の女王を倒すと、 長い眠りにつくという代価を払わなければならなかったのだー それから25年後…プレーヤーは目を覚ました。 「2階が出現し、計10階だと？1階の氷の女王を倒したら終わりじゃなかったのか？｣ この25年で人類が攻略できたのはたったの2階まで…。 伝説のプレイヤー「ダークネス」の名を捨て、新人プレーヤー伊坂圭として、仲間たちを救うため、彼は再びゲートに向かう！

description.ko:
세상이 바뀌고 5년.
최종보스가 나타났다.

[지구 에어리어의 최후의 보스, 서리여왕이 출현합니다.]

최후의 보스!
그녀만 처치하면 예전처럼 살 수 있다!

인류 최고의 플레이어, 어둑서니를 포함한 다섯 명의 플레이어가 마침내 서리여왕을 쓰러뜨리지만...
그들은 기나긴 잠에 빠지는 혹독한 대가를 치뤄야했다.
그로부터 25년 후.

"2층이라니? 서리여왕을 죽이면 끝나는 거 아니었어?"

얼어붙은 동료들을 구하기 위해,

그리고 세상을 구하기 위해.

전설이 된 어둑서니의 이름을 버리고
이제는 신입 플레이어 서준호로 돌아왔다.

description.ru:
В 2019 году мир переменился, и появились такие явления как: врата, монстры, система и игроки, - которых ранее не существовало. 
На протяжении 5 лет между человечеством и захватчиками происходила борьба за власть и территории.
[Финальный босс "Снежная королева" появился]
Если убить его, человечество сможет обрести свободу и вернуться к прежней жизни. 
24 ноября 2024 года четверо из 5 игроков вошли в последнее подземелье на Антарктиде, чтобы победить финального босса на территории Земли. Одним взмахом руки "Снежная королева" заморозила Тихий океан, повергнув человечество в отчаяние. 
Последнему игроку удалось победить финального босса, однако в процессе поглощения ее "ядра" он превратился в ледяную глыбу. А спустя 25 лет, когда поглощение завершилось, он очнулся от криогенного сна, получив фрост-способность EX-класса.

description.zh-hk:
世界發生了天翻地覆的變化，
在第5年時最終BOSS現身。
「地球區域最終BOSS，冰霜女王出現。」

最終BOSS!
只要除掉祂，就能回到過往的生活!

包含人類最強獵人——闇夜在內的五名獵人，
最終擊潰了冰霜女王...
但他們卻陷入長眠，付出了慘痛的代價。

之後過了25年...
「第2層?不是只要殺了冰霜女王，
一切就結束了嗎?」

為了拯救被冰封的夥伴；
為了拯救整個世界，
我拋下成為傳說的闇夜之名，
以本名徐俊昊，作為新人獵人歸來。

description.en: My childhood friend keeps asking me for a selfie to use as a reference for his drawing, what do I do?
description.ja: 久しぶりに連絡を寄こした幼馴染の影介。漫画の作画資料用にわたしの自撮り写真を送ってほしんだって。成長していろいろ変わった私を見て驚け・・・て、ありがとう以外のこと何か言えないの⁉　恥ずかしいのを我慢して撮っているのに！気になり始めた幼馴染同士の自撮りコミュニケーション・ラブコメ！
description.es-la: Mi amigo de la infancia no deja de pedirme una selfie para usarlo como referencia para su dibujo, ¿Qué hago?

description.en: Heesu's world revolves around Chanyoung, his best friend and secret crush. He doesn't mind cheering Chanyoung from the sidelines or listening to all his girl problems. He doesn't care if people only know him as "Chanyoung's friend." Then one day, Heesu starts hearing his name everywhere. On the bus, in the halls, during lunch… Turns out, there's a rumor going around school (Got a love problem? Find Heesu in Class 2 and he'll tell you what to do!) and with that, Heesu suddenly finds himself the center of attention. But how could he give anyone advice? He doesn't even know what to do about his own crush!

description.en: A primitive tribe on an island. During a tempest, a young girl disappears. Ten years later, she mysteriously reappears. The contact with civilization seems to have changed her.
